message: Let's start fair, I'll take most of the money, but you get a decent share.  Accept this and we both win.
Meet me in the middle, no need for games
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need the majority share.  Let's get this done.
You're being greedy, I'm being fair
This is my final offer. I'm willing to give up more, but not much more. Accept this and we both get something.
You're not budging, I'm not giving in
I'm coming down again, but this is as low as I'm willing to go. Let's end this quickly before we lose more money.
You're running out of room to maneuver, I'm not getting desperate
Time is running out. This is my last offer.  Take it or lose it.
You're trying to strong-arm me, but I'm not backing down
This is my final offer. We're both losing a lot of money. Accept this and we can both get something.  Reject and we get nothing.
